page.description: Used with Cache component. Defines when to invalidate the cached Tabbed UI.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Cache invalidate strategy]* defines when a cached Tabbed UI is no longer valid and should be regenerated. The cache strategy can be:

item.name: RevisionNumber
item.description: The cache is invalided when a new version (component is modified) of the Tabbed UI is published.

item.name: Age
item.description: The cache is invalidated after a period of time determined by the *[ui:Max cache age (in minutes)]* property.

discussion.p: This property is only shown when *[ui:Cache component]* is checked.
